definition: awful weather
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
day/sky/heaven
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: This weather plays the devil with my aching joints.
sentences.chinese: 這種鬼天氣讓我的關節很痛。

sentences.english: A bad day has accompanied with bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 倒黴的一天在鬼天氣的伴隨中到來。

sentences.english: Christian : God, I hate the snow.
sentences.chinese: 上帝，我討厭這下雪的鬼天氣。
這鬼天氣實在是太熱了。

sentences.english: I'd hate to bail out in this snowstorm .
sentences.chinese: 我可不想在這種鬼天氣裏跳傘。

sentences.english: Hated the bad weather, did you?
It is a terrible and hot day.
It was a beautiful day, because the ghost weather and become monotonous.
sentences.chinese: 本來美好的一天，就因爲這鬼天氣而變得單調。

definition: A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3
